issue.title: Uniformizing OpenLayers library
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

SHOP and PROXY are using their own OpenLayers library (even if it's the same version, they have their own files).
It should be interesting to use only one OpenLayers library and switch it into the CORE module.
Tests should be made on using the latest stable version of OpenLayers to have an overview of potential fixes to bring to current source code.
Also minifying javascript files should be done using for example (http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/compressor/ & http://wiip.fr/content/jsbuilder-2)

Regarding also GeoExt instead of OpenLayers + ExtJS ?



**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Such industrialization is now available!
Same version of OpenLayers and GeoExt have been used for the complete solution and are deployed with the CORE component.
Minifying javascript files is also fully supported in build process.
